static_content_api.title: Static Content API
static_content_api.description: Delivers comprehensive static content details about hotel properties including names, facilities, images, star ratings, reviews, addresses, and contact information.
static_content_api.purpose: Reduce latency during live search by pre-loading hotel static data

content_fields.Basic: Category, ChainCode, ChainName, Contact, Distance, GeoCode, HeroImage, Id, Language, Name, ProviderHotelId, ProviderId, ProviderName, RelevanceScore, Website, Type, StarRating, ImageCount, RatePlanTypes, Attributes
content_fields.All: Returns all available content (equivalent to combining all other fields)
content_fields.NearByAttractions: Points of interest near the hotel

search_options: Circular region search - Search within radius
Hotel ID search - Specific hotel properties

features.relevance_score: Hotels can be sorted by relevance score based on pre-configured biasing rules
features.supplier_preferencing: Control which supplier's content to display using providerPrefs field
features.multi_supplier_handling: Returns content from single supplier based on configured preferences

common_questions.q: Can I download static content regularly?
common_questions.a: No bulk download API. Use getHotelContent API to fetch hotel details as needed in your booking workflow.
Combine fields in one request: contentFields=Basic,Facilities,Images returns Basic fields plus Facilities and Images.

common_questions.q: How to handle same hotel from multiple suppliers?
common_questions.a: API returns content from single supplier based on pre-configured supplier preferencing or providerPrefs in request.

error_codes.4001: Invalid data in request - Check fields[] for details
error_codes.5000: Unknown system error - Contact support with correlationId

search_api.title: Hotel Search API
search_api.description: Streamlines finding suitable accommodations with detailed and customizable searches using various parameters.

async_search_workflow.title: Asynchronous Search API Workflow
async_search_workflow.description: Non-blocking search flow that displays results as they arrive from suppliers. Ideal for B2C websites to keep users engaged.
benefits: Search becomes as fast as your fastest supplier

steps.description: Make parallel calls for search initialization and static content
steps.returns: Search Init returns token; Static Content returns hotel details

steps.description: Start displaying hotels using static content while rates are being fetched
Call async API with token every 500ms
steps.returns: List of hotels with rates + status (InProgress or Completed)

steps.description: Display newly received rates as they arrive from suppliers
Stop polling when status is 'Completed' - all supplier results processed

statuses.InProgress: More results are being processed - continue polling

blocking_search_workflow.title: Blocking Search API Workflow
blocking_search_workflow.description: Synchronous search that returns complete results in single response. Useful when user wait time is not a concern.
use_cases: When complete results are required upfront
blocking_search_workflow.difference_from_async: Returns both token and complete result set in same response, eliminating need for polling

steps.description: Make single search API call with all parameters
API waits for all suppliers to respond or timeout
Get token and full result set in single response
Show all hotels and rates to user

booking_api.title: Booking API
booking_api.description: Complete booking flow from search to confirmation
workflow: View rooms and rates for selected hotel

cancel_api.title: Cancel API
cancel_api.description: Cancel reservations made via ZentrumHub Booking API
cancel_api.required_parameter: bookingId - Received from Book API response

cancellation_penalty_api.data_source: Fetches policies from booking database stored during booking process
